name: Lineup Stars Challenge
description:
Lineup Stars is a new addictive puzzle game!

• Form a full line of blocks either horizontally or vertically to score and remove it up from the board
• Building crossing lines creates a Star in the intersection
• Place a shape onto empty cells with the Stars to increase a score for it
• Collect stars in challenges to increase main score multiplier
• Keep the board from filling with the blocks.

Unique Lineup Stars features:
• Fun and simple gameplay
• 600 FILL challenges
• 600 ROTATE challenges
• 600 MIRROR challenges
• 5+5+5 new challenges every day!
